name: NewWorldVitaeAeternum
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new world
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Madness and death stalk the crew of a doomed expedition to a legendary island. Unspeakable things scuttle between the walls, and reality runs like melting wax. Hardened mariners shiver in the dark, whispering, "Have you seen the Red Sign?"

New World: Vitae Aeternum is an Alexa-powered interactive audio drama, set as a prelude to New World, the all new massively multiplayer online role-playing game. Wake up as a member of the crew of the Santa María de la Consolación. Tell Alexa which paths to take as you navigate this nightmare voyage at sea. Do you have what it takes to survive?
